column2: Real-time single-molecule imaging of quantum interference
column3: 量子干扰的实时单分子成像
column4: The observation of interference patterns in double-slit experiments with massive particles is generally regarded as the ultimate demonstration of the quantum nature of these objects. Such matter–wave interference has been observed for electrons, neutrons, atoms and molecules and, in contrast to classical physics, quantum interference can be observed when single particles arrive at the detector one by one. The build-up of such patterns in experiments with electrons has been described as the “most beautiful experiment in physics”. Here, we show how a combination of nanofabrication and nano-imaging allows us to record the full two-dimensional build-up of quantum interference patterns in real time for phthalocyanine molecules and for derivatives of phthalocyanine molecules, which have masses of 514 AMU and 1,298 AMU respectively. A laser-controlled micro-evaporation source was used to produce a beam of molecules with the required intensity and coherence, and the gratings were machined in 10-nm-thick silicon nitride membranes to reduce the effect of van der Waals forces. Wide-field fluorescence microscopy detected the position of each molecule with an accuracy of 10 nm and revealed the build-up of a deterministic ensemble interference pattern from single molecules that arrived stochastically at the detector. In addition to providing this particularly clear demonstration of wave–particle duality, our approach could also be used to study larger molecules and explore the boundary between quantum and classical physics.
column5: 在带有大颗粒的双缝实验中观察干涉图通常被认为是这些物体量子性质的最终证明。已经观察到这种物质对电子，中子，原子和分子的波干扰，并且与经典物理学相反，当单个粒子一个一个到达检测器时，可以观察到量子干扰。在电子实验中这种模式的建立已被描述为“物理学中最美丽的实验”。在这里，我们展示了纳米加工和纳米成像的结合如何使我们能够实时记录质量为514＆＃160的酞菁分子和酞菁分子衍生物的量子干涉图的完整二维建立。 AMU和1,298＆＃160; AMU。使用激光控制的微蒸发源产生具有所需强度和相干性的分子束，并在10纳米厚的氮化硅膜中加工光栅以减少范德华力的影响。宽视野荧光显微镜以10纳米的精度检测每个分子的位置，并揭示了随机到达检测器的单个分子的确定性整体干涉图样的建立。除了提供波粒子对偶性的这种特别清晰的证明之外，我们的方法还可以用于研究较大的分子，并探索量子物理学与经典物理学之间的边界。

column2: A nanomechanical mass sensor with yoctogram resolution
column3: 具有八边形分辨率的纳米机械质量传感器
column4: Nanomechanical resonators have been used to weigh cells, biomolecules and gas molecules, and to study basic phenomena in surface science, such as phase transitions and diffusion. These experiments all rely on the ability of nanomechanical mass sensors to resolve small masses. Here, we report mass sensing experiments with a resolution of 1.7 yg (1 yg = 10−24 g), which corresponds to the mass of one proton. The resonator is a carbon nanotube of length ∼150 nm that vibrates at a frequency of almost 2 GHz. This unprecedented level of sensitivity allows us to detect adsorption events of naphthalene molecules (C10H8), and to measure the binding energy of a xenon atom on the nanotube surface. These ultrasensitive nanotube resonators could have applications in mass spectrometry, magnetometry and surface science.
column5: 纳米机械共振器已用于称量细胞，生物分子和气体分子，并研究表面科学中的基本现象，例如相变和扩散。 这些实验都依赖于纳米机械质量传感器分辨小质量的能力。 在此，我们报告了质量感应实验，其分辨率为1.7＆＃160; yg（1＆＃160; yg＆＃160; =＆＃160; 10 <sup>＆＃8722; 24 </ sup> g） 一个质子的质量 谐振器是长度约为150 nm的碳纳米管，它以近2 GHz的频率振动。 这种前所未有的灵敏度水平使我们能够检测萘分子（C <sub> 10 </ sub> H <sub> 8 </ sub>）的吸附事件，并测量氙原子在纳米管表面的结合能。 这些超灵敏的纳米管谐振器可以在质谱，磁力测定和表面科学中应用。</ p>

column2: Observation of quantum interference in molecular charge transport
column3: 分子电荷传输中的量子干涉观察
column4: As the dimensions of a conductor approach the nanoscale, quantum effects begin to dominate, and it becomes possible to control the conductance through direct manipulation of the electron wavefunction. Such control has been demonstrated in various mesoscopic devices at cryogenic temperatures, but it has proved to be difficult to exert control over the wavefunction at higher temperatures. Molecules have typical energy level spacings (∼eV) that are much larger than the thermal energy at 300 K (∼25 meV), and are therefore natural candidates for such experiments. Previously, phenomena such as giant magnetoresistance, Kondo effects and conductance switching have been observed in single molecules, and theorists have predicted that it should also be possible to observe quantum interference in molecular conductors, but until now all the evidence for such behaviour has been indirect. Here, we report the observation of destructive quantum interference in charge transport through two-terminal molecular junctions at room temperature. We studied five different rigid π-conjugated molecular wires, all of which form self-assembled monolayers on a gold surface, and find that the degree of interference can be controlled by simple chemical modifications of the molecular wire.
column5: 随着导体的尺寸接近纳米级，量子效应开始占主导地位，并且有可能通过直接操纵电子波函数来控制电导。已经在低温下在各种介观装置中证明了这种控制，但是事实证明在较高温度下难以对波函数施加控制。分子的典型能级间距（eV）远大于300 K（＃8764; 25 meV）时的热能，因此是此类实验的自然候选者。以前，在单个分子中已经观察到诸如巨磁阻，近藤效应和电导转换等现象，并且理论家预测，还应该可能观察到分子导体中的量子干扰，但是直到现在，所有这种行为的证据都是间接的。在这里，我们报告在室温下通过两个末端分子结的电荷传输中破坏性量子干扰的观察。我们研究了五种不同的刚性共轭分子丝，它们均在金表面上形成自组装单分子层，并发现干扰程度可以通过分子丝的简单化学修饰来控制。

column2: Stable cycling of double-walled silicon nanotube battery anodes through solid–electrolyte interphase control
column3: 通过固电解质相间控制稳定双壁硅纳米管电池阳极的循环
column4: Although the performance of lithium ion-batteries continues to improve, their energy density and cycle life remain insufficient for applications in consumer electronics, transport and large-scale renewable energy storage. Silicon has a large charge storage capacity and this makes it an attractive anode material, but pulverization during cycling and an unstable solid–electrolyte interphase has limited the cycle life of silicon anodes to hundreds of cycles. Here, we show that anodes consisting of an active silicon nanotube surrounded by an ion-permeable silicon oxide shell can cycle over 6,000 times in half cells while retaining more than 85% of their initial capacity. The outer surface of the silicon nanotube is prevented from expansion by the oxide shell, and the expanding inner surface is not exposed to the electrolyte, resulting in a stable solid–electrolyte interphase. Batteries containing these double-walled silicon nanotube anodes exhibit charge capacities approximately eight times larger than conventional carbon anodes and charging rates of up to 20C (a rate of 1C corresponds to complete charge or discharge in one hour).
column5: 尽管锂离子电池的性能不断提高，但它们的能量密度和循环寿命仍然不足以用于消费电子产品，运输和大规模可再生能源存储。硅具有大的电荷存储容量，这使其成为有吸引力的阳极材料，但是在循环过程中粉化和不稳定的固体电解质相间相将硅阳极的循环寿命限制为数百个循环。在这里，我们表明，由被离子渗透性氧化硅壳包围的活性硅纳米管组成的阳极可以在半电池中循环6,000次以上，同时保留其初始容量的85％以上。通过氧化物壳防止硅纳米管的外表面膨胀，并且膨胀的内表面不暴露于电解质，从而导致稳定的固体电解质相间。包含这些双壁硅纳米管阳极的电池的充电容量约为传统碳阳极的八倍，充电速率最高为20C（1C的速率相当于一小时内完全充电或放电）。

column2: Remote Joule heating by a carbon nanotube
column3: 通过碳纳米管进行远程焦耳加热
column4: Minimizing Joule heating remains an important goal in the design of electronic devices. The prevailing model of Joule heating relies on a simple semiclassical picture in which electrons collide with the atoms of a conductor, generating heat locally and only in regions of non-zero current density, and this model has been supported by most experiments. Recently, however, it has been predicted that electric currents in graphene and carbon nanotubes can couple to the vibrational modes of a neighbouring material, heating it remotely. Here, we use in situ electron thermal microscopy to detect the remote Joule heating of a silicon nitride substrate by a single multiwalled carbon nanotube. At least 84% of the electrical power supplied to the nanotube is dissipated directly into the substrate, rather than in the nanotube itself. Although it has different physical origins, this phenomenon is reminiscent of induction heating or microwave dielectric heating. Such an ability to dissipate waste energy remotely could lead to improved thermal management in electronic devices.
column5: 最小化焦耳热仍然是电子设备设计中的重要目标。流行的焦耳加热模型依赖于一个简单的半经典图像，其中电子与导体原子碰撞，仅在非零电流密度区域内局部产生热量，并且该模型已得到大多数实验的支持。然而，最近，已经预测到石墨烯和碳纳米管中的电流会耦合到相邻材料的振动模式，从而对其进行远程加热。在这里，我们使用原位电子热显微镜检测单个多壁碳纳米管对氮化硅衬底的远程焦耳热。提供给纳米管的电能的至少84％直接耗散到基板中，而不是耗散在纳米管本身中。尽管它具有不同的物理起源，但这种现象让人想起感应加热或微波介电加热。这种远程耗散能量的能力可以改善电子设备的热管理。

column2: A robust scanning diamond sensor for nanoscale imaging with single nitrogen-vacancy centres
column3: 强大的扫描金刚石传感器，用于具有单个氮空位中心的纳米级成像
column4: The nitrogen-vacancy defect centre in diamond has potential applications in nanoscale electric and magnetic-field sensing, single-photon microscopy, quantum information processing and bioimaging. These applications rely on the ability to position a single nitrogen-vacancy centre within a few nanometres of a sample, and then scan it across the sample surface, while preserving the centre's spin coherence and readout fidelity. However, existing scanning techniques, which use a single diamond nanocrystal grafted onto the tip of a scanning probe microscope, suffer from short spin coherence times due to poor crystal quality, and from inefficient far-field collection of the fluorescence from the nitrogen-vacancy centre. Here, we demonstrate a robust method for scanning a single nitrogen-vacancy centre within tens of nanometres from a sample surface that addresses both of these concerns. This is achieved by positioning a single nitrogen-vacancy centre at the end of a high-purity diamond nanopillar, which we use as the tip of an atomic force microscope. Our approach ensures long nitrogen-vacancy spin coherence times (∼75 µs), enhanced nitrogen-vacancy collection efficiencies due to waveguiding, and mechanical robustness of the device (several weeks of scanning time). We are able to image magnetic domains with widths of 25 nm, and demonstrate a magnetic field sensitivity of 56 nT Hz–1/2 at a frequency of 33 kHz, which is unprecedented for scanning nitrogen-vacancy centres.
column5: 金刚石中的氮空位缺陷中心在纳米级电场和磁场感测，单光子显微镜，量子信息处理和生物成像中具有潜在的应用。这些应用依赖于将单个氮空位中心定位在样品几纳米内，然后在整个样品表面进行扫描的能力，同时保留中心的自旋相干性和读出保真度。但是，现有的扫描技术，其使用嫁接在扫描探针显微镜尖端的单个金刚石纳米晶体，由于晶体质量差，自旋相干时间短，并且氮空位中心的荧光远场收集效率低。在这里，我们展示了一种健壮的方法来扫描距样品表面数十纳米以内的单个氮空位中心，从而解决了这两个问题。这是通过在高纯度金刚石纳米柱的末端放置一个氮空位中心来实现的，我们将其用作原子力显微镜的尖端。我们的方法可确保较长的氮空位自旋相干时间（＆＃8764; 75＆＃181; s），由于波导作用而提高的氮空位收集效率以及装置的机械强度（扫描时间为几周）。我们能够对宽度为25 nm的磁畴进行成像，并在33 kHz的频率下证明56 nT Hz ＆＃8211; 1/2 的磁场灵敏度，这是前所未有的扫描氮空位中心。

column2: An atlas of carbon nanotube optical transitions
column3: 碳纳米管光学跃迁图集
column4: Electron–electron interactions are significantly enhanced in one-dimensional systems, and single-walled carbon nanotubes provide a unique opportunity for studying such interactions and the related many-body effects in one dimension. However, single-walled nanotubes can have a wide range of diameters and hundreds of different structures, each defined by its chiral index (n,m), where n and m are integers that can have values from zero up to 30 or more. Moreover, one-third of these structures are metals and two-thirds are semiconductors, and they display optical resonances at many different frequencies. Systematic studies of many-body effects in nanotubes would therefore benefit from the availability of a technique for identifying the chiral index of a nanotube based on a measurement of its optical resonances, and vice versa. Here, we report the establishment of a structure–property ‘atlas’ for nanotube optical transitions based on simultaneous electron diffraction measurements of the chiral index and Rayleigh scattering measurements of the optical resonances of 206 different single-walled nanotube structures. The nanotubes, which were suspended across open slit structures on silicon substrates, had diameters in the range 1.3–4.7 nm. We also use this atlas as a starting point for a systematic study of many-body effects in the excited states of single-walled nanotubes. We find that electron–electron interactions shift the optical resonance energies by the same amount for both metallic and semiconducting nanotubes, and that this shift (which corresponds to an effective Fermi velocity renormalization) increases monotonically with nanotube diameter. This behaviour arises from two sources: an intriguing cancellation of long-range electron–electron interaction effects, and the dependence of short-range electron–electron interactions on diameter.
column5: 电子与电子的相互作用在一维系统中得到了显着增强，单壁碳纳米管为研究此类相互作用以及一维相关的多体效应提供了独特的机会。然而，单壁纳米管可以具有宽范围的直径和数百种不同的结构，每种结构均由其手性指数（n，m）定义，其中n和m是整数，其值可以为零到30或更大。此外，这些结构的三分之一是金属，三分之二是半导体，它们在许多不同的频率下显示出光学共振。因此，纳米管中多体效应的系统研究将受益于基于纳米管的光共振测量来鉴定纳米管的手性指数的技术，反之亦然。在这里，我们报告了一个结构体属性地图集的建立。基于同时手性指数的电子衍射测量和206种不同单壁纳米管结构的光学共振的瑞利散射测量，对纳米管进行了光跃迁。悬浮在硅衬底上的开口狭缝结构上的纳米管的直径在1.3到4.7 nm的范围内。我们还将这个图集用作系统研究单壁纳米管激发态中多体效应的起点。我们发现，电子和电子相互作用使金属和半导体纳米管的光学共振能量偏移相同的量，并且该偏移（对应于有效的费米速度重新归一化）随纳米管直径单调增加。这种现象的产生有两个原因：一个有趣的是消除了长程电子的相互作用，以及短程电子对直径的依赖性。

column2: Tunable infrared plasmonic devices using graphene/insulator stacks
column3: 使用石墨烯/绝缘体叠层的可调谐红外等离子体设备
column4: The collective oscillation of carriers—the plasmon—in graphene has many desirable properties, including tunability and low loss. However, in single-layer graphene, the dependence on carrier concentration of both the plasmonic resonance frequency and magnitude is relatively weak, limiting its applications in photonics. Here, we demonstrate transparent photonic devices based on graphene/insulator stacks, which are formed by depositing alternating wafer-scale graphene sheets and thin insulating layers, then patterning them together into photonic-crystal-like structures. We show experimentally that the plasmon in such stacks is unambiguously non-classical. Compared with doping in single-layer graphene, distributing carriers into multiple graphene layers effectively enhances the plasmonic resonance frequency and magnitude, which is different from the effect in a conventional semiconductor superlattice and is a direct consequence of the unique carrier density scaling law of the plasmonic resonance of Dirac fermions. Using patterned graphene/insulator stacks, we demonstrate widely tunable far-infrared notch filters with 8.2 dB rejection ratios and terahertz linear polarizers with 9.5 dB extinction ratios. An unpatterned stack consisting of five graphene layers shields 97.5% of electromagnetic radiation at frequencies below 1.2 THz. This work could lead to the development of transparent mid- and far-infrared photonic devices such as detectors, modulators and three-dimensional metamaterial systems.
column5: 石墨烯中的载流子/等离子体激元的集体振荡具有许多理想的特性，包括可调性和低损耗。然而，在单层石墨烯中，等离子体共振频率和幅度对载流子浓度的依赖性相对较弱，限制了其在光子学中的应用。在这里，我们演示了基于石墨烯/绝缘体堆叠的透明光子器件，该器件是通过沉积交替的晶圆级石墨烯片和薄绝缘层，然后将它们一起图案化为光子晶体状结构而形成的。我们通过实验证明，在此类堆栈中的等离激元无疑是非经典的。与在单层石墨烯中掺杂相比，将载流子分布到多个石墨烯层中可以有效地增强等离子体共振频率和幅度，这与常规半导体超晶格中的效应不同，这是等离子体的独特载流子密度缩放定律的直接结果。狄拉克费米子的共振。使用图案化的石墨烯/绝缘体叠层，我们展示了具有8.2＆＃160dB抑制比和9.5＆＃160dB消光比的太赫兹线性偏振器的可广泛调谐的远红外陷波滤波器。由五层石墨烯层组成的无图案叠层可屏蔽低于1.2THz的频率的97.5％的电磁辐射。这项工作可能会导致开发透明的中红外和远红外光子设备，例如探测器，调制器和三维超材料系统。

column2: Red, green and blue lasing enabled by single-exciton gain in colloidal quantum dot films
column3: 胶体量子点膜中的单激子增益实现红色，绿色和蓝色激光发射
column4: Colloidal quantum dots exhibit efficient photoluminescence with widely tunable bandgaps as a result of quantum confinement effects. Such quantum dots are emerging as an appealing complement to epitaxial semiconductor laser materials, which are ubiquitous and technologically mature, but unable to cover the full visible spectrum (red, green and blue; RGB). However, the requirement for high colloidal-quantum-dot packing density, and losses due to non-radiative multiexcitonic Auger recombination, have hindered the development of lasers based on colloidal quantum dots. Here, we engineer CdSe/ZnCdS core/shell colloidal quantum dots with aromatic ligands, which form densely packed films exhibiting optical gain across the visible spectrum with less than one exciton per colloidal quantum dot on average. This single-exciton gain allows the films to reach the threshold of amplified spontaneous emission at very low optical pump energy densities of 90 µJ cm–2, more than one order of magnitude better than previously reported values. We leverage the low-threshold gain of these nanocomposite films to produce the first colloidal-quantum-dot vertical-cavity surface-emitting lasers (CQD-VCSEL). Our results represent a significant step towards full-colour single-material lasers.
column5: 由于量子限制效应，胶体量子点表现出有效的光致发光，并具有可广泛调节的带隙。这类量子点正逐渐成为外延半导体激光材料的诱人补充，外延半导体激光材料无处不在且技术成熟，但无法覆盖全部可见光谱（红色，绿色和蓝色； RGB）。然而，对高胶体量子点堆积密度的要求以及由于非辐射多激子俄歇复合而造成的损失，阻碍了基于胶体量子点的激光器的发展。在这里，我们设计了具有芳族配体的CdSe / ZnCdS核/壳胶体量子点，它们形成致密堆积的薄膜，在整个可见光谱范围内显示光学增益，每个胶体量子点平均少于一个激子。这种单激子增益可以使薄膜以90＆＃160;＆＃181; J＆＃160; cm ＆＃8211; 2 的非常低的光泵浦能量密度达到放大的自发发射阈值，比以前报告的值好一个数量级。我们利用这些纳米复合膜的低阈值增益来生产第一批胶体量子点垂直腔面发射激光器（CQD-VCSEL）。我们的结果代表了向全色单材料激光器迈出的重要一步。
